author: Ramesh Susarla
title: 85-year-old woman wins COVID battle
description: Five persons discharged from hospital in Anantapur
content:
An 85-year-old woman from Hindupur who was tested positive for COVID-9 was discharged from KIMS Saveera Hospital on Tuesday night.
She was among the five persons discharged from the COVID19 special hospital. The woman was tested positive on April 5. She was … [+587 chars]
